Blog.post: Well. Talk about happy stuffs. Like... Gee I can't think of anything. Okay. Concentrate . Er. I'm goin shopping 2nite! Is that all? Unfortunately, yes. I shud learn to be thankful for everything I have. Actually I'm a really lucky gal. But I just don't have a positive mind. *growls* C'mon. List 5 things that shud make me happy. 1. I'm home. 2. I'm going shopping. 3. I'm free from dat school for almost 4 weeks. 4. I can go online as long as I want. 5. I have JESUS. Oh please, please , make my faith grow stronger. I really need it at the moment. ~*~

I just heard from my friend yesterdae dat *** (censored - coz it's actually a secret dat I'm not supposed to know) is actually DATING sum1 from my (old) class. Whoa! What a surprise. HER dating HIM. Why on earth is the world never fair??? And how could he not see wad kind of gal she really is?? A gal with a mask. A gal PRETENDING dat's she's kind and humble and all that. Gosh, dat makes me sick. Sum ppl just can't see one's true personalities. I pity them. ~*~

Aiya. Just came back from my (old) school. I got dis feeling again. Left out. lonely. Well, not their fault. And not my fault as well. It's just a natural thing that will happen no matter how hard u try to stay close with 'em, and I shud understand. But I can't! I'm not even close to my bestest friend anymore. Gee. Great. I have no real friends. ~*~
Aiyah.. Actually I wanna modify my template, but I'm too lazy to do that.. No time either.. This template is so boring, dude!

Phew. At last one of my assignments is done. Well, many are still waiting. That gal has been better. I was afraid that I'd strangle her if she continued acting like dat. Luckily she didn't. U know who I am talking about. I'm gonna be home in less than 48 hours! Yay!

What's Corona Australis? Abbreviation: CrA English name: Southern Crown A small constellation of the southern hemisphere. It lies at the south-western edge of Sagittarius, north of Telescopium. As Corona Australis is located at the edge of the Milky Way it is still an interesting constellation for observations although it is so small. On 25th of September 1997 the Hubble Space Telescope sends a picture of a neutron star alone in space located in this constellation. Mythological Background According to "The Night Sky" by Ian Ridpath this constellation was known to the ancient Greeks (despite of its very southern location). Their legends said that Corona Australis is the crown of the neighboring centaur, Sagittarius. From http://www.seds.org/Maps/Stars_en/Fig/coronaaustr.html
Ok, I shall introduce myself now. I'm a 16-year-old girl from a country which I doubt that you'll ever wanna visit..... What?! Oops. Assignments calling me. Continue next time. Cya.

Is my previous entry too lame? Well, sorry. Actually I want to start grumbling about something, but since it's my new blog, I shall not do that. I must write about HAPPY stuffs. Like I'm going back to Jkt in.. *counting* 4 days! Yay! ^^
